situation.title: Possibilities and obligations of foreigners when entering the Czech Republic
situation.meta_description: Rules and recommendations for entering the territory of the Czech Republic.

situation.title: Tourism in the CZ
situation.meta_description: It is now not possible to travel to the Czech Republic for tourism or to visit friends.

situation.title: Business trips to the CZ
situation.meta_description: It is possible to travel to the Czech Republic only in strictly necessary cases. Trips to work or to do business (including commuters) are a part of this category.

situation.title: Study in the CZ
situation.meta_description: Rules and recommendations for students entering the territory of the Czech Republic.
